data.actual_result: Cancel button flies upwards/to the top of your screen
data.expected_result: Cancel button should stay at the bottom of your screen
data.short_description: Cancel button flies up when clicking on an embedded youtube name link [NOTE: Must be on latest Testflight with (4331)] i'd recommend trying it a couple times so u get the hang of it.
data.steps_to_repro: - have an embedded music link by a bot (like in the video) - click on the blue name so u get the options modal like user settings etc. - click somewhere so the modal goes away - as following it should open youtube - click done - observe your cancel button on top
